name: Castle Stealth
description:
Help and finish the kings plan, destroy her and finish the adventure.

Beware of the guards and don't let them catch you, try to finish the game as fast as you can.

Play with the arrow or WASD keys

Good Luck

Did you enjoyed this experience, would you like to play this game with more levels? share your thoughts and opinions

Graphics by BlueApollo:https://blueapollo.itch.io/oracle-1bit-assets

Music by Strobe : https://battleofthebits.org/barracks/Profile/Strobe/

Want to help me out? buy me a Ko-Fi thanks!
